items.sentence: My father can speak French as well as English.
The captain ordered his men to gather at once.
The doctor said that you should get more rest.
Tom thought what Mary was carrying was a bomb.
Tom told me he wanted to go mountain climbing.
Tom told me where he had hidden the old coins.
Tickets are selling fast and space is limited.
Tom and I have something to do this afternoon.
Tom went into the kitchen to drink some water.
Tom doesn\'t know what Mary does for a living.
